Name: Maximus Pizzeria - Steakhouse
Review Text:
One of my favourite places in Amsterdam! Sure, is in a touristic area, but the food is nice, though I find the place a bit exotic. Is a steakhouse, but they serve Italian food and quite often there are Spanish songs playing ðŸ˜¶
Pizzas and pasta are good and the chef is actually Italian too.
